title: Goodbye forever my friends :'(
body:
I went to a doctor today and I have some bad news.

He diagnosed me with super Telstra saltiosis. {{item:3151}} 

It's a rare condition that arises after being subjected to Tesltra's rural internet for 7 years.
The only cure is to retreat to a country that does not have 3rd world internet.

My first thought was America but I'm a student and would prefer to stay alive.

Then I thought Britain. 
However EUW... no ty.

I have decided instead to simply accept that Telstra will forever have Australia by the balls and continue to watch my wallet turn to dust as I give them $120 a month for 15 gigabyte of pure mind-numbing torture. 

FIN

liek dis if u cri evry teim 

750/750 fully stacked tear {{item:3070}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
